price: 85. ¡Pueblo mío!, pesen y midan con equidad. No se apropien de lo que le corresponde a la gente y no corrompan la tierra.
arabic: وَيَٰقَوۡمِ أَوۡفُواْ ٱلۡمِكۡيَالَ وَٱلۡمِيزَانَ بِٱلۡقِسۡطِۖ وَلَا تَبۡخَسُواْ ٱلنَّاسَ أَشۡيَآءَهُمۡ وَلَا تَعۡثَوۡاْ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ مُفۡسِدِينَ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: wayāqawmi awfū al-mik'yāla wal-mīzāna bil-qis'ṭi walā tabkhasū al-nāsa ashyāahum walā taʿthaw fī al-arḍi muf'sidīna
